mapper.insert: insert into oa_sys.travel(uid, releaseUid, destination, expenses, reason, nextUid, process) values (#{uid}, #{releaseUid}, #{destination}, #{expenses}, #{reason}, #{nextUid}, #{process})
mapper.select: select uid, destination, expenses, reason, status, count, nextUid, reject_reason, process, create_time, update_time from oa_sys.travel where releaseUid = #{releaseUid} and status >= 0 order by create_time desc
select uid, releaseUid, destination, expenses, reason, status, count, nextUid, reject_reason, process, create_time, update_time from oa_sys.travel where uid = #{uid}
select uid, releaseUid, destination, expenses, reason, status, reject_reason, process, create_time, update_time from oa_sys.travel where nextUid = #{nextUid} and status = 0 order by create_time desc
